name: Infinite Ragnarok
description:
Ragnarök has come.

The world was overturned, the earth shook and the water broke its banks.

A lonely Viking hero tries to confront his fate and escape into the raging sea on his drakkar.

Steer your drakkar across the water only.

The drakkar can jump over islands. Make sure that your Viking does not hit the ground.

Dodge birds, avoid snakes and other enemies.

Collect runes. Helmet medallions will help you along the way and make you invulnerable. Beware of skull medallions.

CONTROLS: WASD or arrow keys.

  • W or up arrow - jump
  • A/D or left arrow/right arrow- forward and backward
  • S - get down
  • Space - pause
  • Enter - select
  • Esc - exit

The sea is endless, or maybe not.

Music:

"Galway" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
